content: click here 1 for english and click here 2 for dutch crochet pattern **materials** ***blue version*** **scheepjes colour crafter parade** 100% premium acrylic anti pilling 300m/100g **yarn a** 404 green blend x 2 2 2 2 2 balls **yarn b** 605 mountain lake x 2 2 2 2 2 balls **yarn c** 405 blue blend x 2 2 2 2 2 balls **scheepjes colour crafter** 100% premium acrylic anti pilling 300m/100g **yarn d** 1820 goes x 1 1 1 1 1 ball ***pink version*** **scheepjes terrazzo** 70% recycled mulesing free wool 30% recycled viscose 175m/50g **yarn a** 721 lampone x 2 2 3 3 3 balls **yarn b** 722 anguria x 2 2 3 3 3 balls **yarn c** 723 rosa x 2 2 3 3 3 balls **yarn d** 745 pergamena x 1 1 1 1 1 ball ***both versions*** 4mm crochet hook stitch markers **gauge/gauge** 15 sts and 9 row to measure 10 x 10cm over treble_crochet using a 4mm hook 1 https //www scheepjes com/en/colour-block-sweater-13429/ 2 https //www scheepjes com/nl/colour-block-sweater-13428/
